localize.text: “No, becoming a Wing is not my goal.”
“Well, everyone says that. But let me put it this way: What use are Wings if you can’t fly?”
“What if we could reach the sky without Wings?”
“What I mean is, if we grow the stalk straight up like a tree, we could reach the sky for sure. Even if it would be a slow climb.”
“Can you feel it? The sunlight here is very warm. Sometimes, I dream about photosynthesis, lying down comfortably with my eyes closed. Just soaking it up.”
I close my eyes, basking in the sunlight’s warmth…
